author: vors
body:
For Full CLR version, we need the following:
- [x] story to do the real signing (it should be supported in [cli](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/840bccd796bb09de728832c3f6c5394335aad507/src/dotnet/commands/dotnet-compile-csc/Program.cs#L182))
- [x] DSC need to be able to build our source dependencies from the arbitrary folder. Relative paths inside `AssemlbyInfo.cs` are resolved incrorrectly (not for the file folder, but for current process folder)
title: Code signing story
